Name: Echo Divide
About the game: Explore unique worlds, fight demons and save the world in this story driven hack and slash adventure. -Retro 'scuffed' graphics -Items and abilities gained organically through exploration -Narrative focused action-adventure experience -Fast paced punishing boss fights Save the world. Watch it burn.
